ModMetaData.name: Greydale Defense Ships
ModMetaData.author: SpaceDorf
ModMetaData.description:
0.01 This Mod Adds Spaceships and Aircraft Manufactured by Greydale Defense to your Arsenal.
- Smilodon Troop Transport. Your Fortress away from Home
- Cheetah Attack Craft. Strike fast. Strike hard.
Credits to Cpt.Ohu for creating the awesome Dropship Mod and rooki1 for creating the equally awesome Rimsenal Howard Taylor for the 70 Maxims
whoever helped me.
